meanings.definition: A thin pancake made from a batter and cooked on a hot griddle.
meanings.sent1: For breakfast, I enjoyed a delicious crepe filled with strawberries.
meanings.sent2: The crepe was filled with Nutella and bananas, a classic combination.
meanings.sent3: At the fair, I saw a crepe doing a little dance on the griddle!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as thin and delicate as a crepe, spreading warmth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the crepe sizzling on the griddle filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A lightweight fabric with a crinkled surface.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful crepe dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The curtains in the room were made of a delicate crepe material.
meanings.sent3: The crepe fabric fluttered in the breeze like a gentle butterfly.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was soft and airy, like the touch of crepe against the skin.
meanings.sent5: The crepe fabric shimmered in the sunlight, creating a lovely effect.
